content:encoded:
Topics: Childhood Trauma, Sexual Integrity, Affairs, Addictions, Pornography, Same-Sex Attraction
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Milan Yerkovich

Caller Questions:

  1. I was abused so badly as a child that I was covered in cigarette burns; watching the movie I Can Only Imagine helped me. 
  2. Do I legally separate or divorce my husband of 54yrs who has been leading a double life? He was an airline pilot and had numerous affairs. 
  3. How do I speak in love to my granddaughter after she divorced her husband and is now in a lesbian relationship?

Suggested Resources:
One Year Bible for Men
Take Your Life Back

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
